short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One couple of mnemonic, for all of blockchains. SWTC BTC ETH BSC HECO POLYGON

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One couple of mnemonic, for all of blockchains. SWTC BTC ETH BSC HECO POLYGON TRON XRP EOS.

You can easily manage thousands of derived accounts to surf on the Crypto & DeFi & GameFi 

update log:
1. v2.0.1 fixed blank view when interactive with dapp.
2. v2.0.2 fixed browser link bug & add token which CCDAO support automatically
3. v2.0.3 add transfer with Tag feature in Ripple 
4. v2.0.4 change MATIC to POL for Polygon blockchain
